parameters.name: index_name
parameters.description: (string) Name of the vector index to scan.

num_results.description: Number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

last_primary_key.description: Primary key of the last entry returned in the previous scan.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Scan the specified vector index and return the first
